definitions.title: 1. m.
definitions.body: Ge 2:14, Ge 15:16 (JE), also (esp. of days, months, sons, etc.) Ge 1:19, Ex 28:20, Ex 39:13, Nu 7:30, Nu 29:23, Jos 19:17 (all P), Ju Jdg 19:5, Je 39:2, Je 52:6, 1Ch 27:7 b, 2Ch 20:26, Ezr 8:33; n. om. 2Sa 3:4 = 1Ch 3:2, 1Ch 2:14, 1Ch 3:15, 1Ch 8:2, 1Ch 12:10, 1Ch 23:19, 1Ch 24:8, 1Ch 24:23, 1Ch 25:11, 1Ch 26:2, 1Ch 26:4; 1Ch 26:11, 1Ch 27:7 a, Ezr 10:14, Da 11:2; sc.[[חׂדֶשׁ]] Ez Eze 1:1, Zec 8:19; pl. in [[עִים]]([[י]])[[בְּנֵי רְבִ]] sons of fourth (ones), i.e. to the fourth generation, 2Ki 10:30, 2Ki 15:12 (cf. [[[רִבֵּעַ]]], and [O Aram. Nērab] [[בני רבע]] Cook 107).

definitions.title: 2. f.
definitions.body: of years, 1Ki 6:1, 1Ki 6:37, 2Ki 18:9, Je 25:1, Je 28:1, Je 36:1, Je 45:1, Je 46:2, Je 51:59, Zec 6:8, Le 19:24 (H); [[מֵאֵת רְבִעִית]] 1Ki 6:33, rd. [[מְזֻזׁת רְבֻעוֹת]] LXX Vulgate Th Sta Kmp Kit Benz Bur.
